features: 🖨️ MINI PRINTER STICKER MAKER: Experience printing like never before. Say goodbye to ink hassles; this doodle dash maker operates without ink cartridges, ensuring a smooth and carefree printing adventure.
🖼️ MINI THERMAL PRINTER STICKER PAPER: Our post it printer ensures a seamless experience across various devices. Ideal for students, kids, professionals or anyone in need of hassle-free printing.
📱 BLUETOOTH POCKET PRINTER: Say hello to label maker printing with remote connectivity. Simply connect your phone iOS or Android to the printer via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi and start printing in seconds.
📸 PRINTER INKLESS: Print your moments anywhere, our small sticker printer is your on-the-go solution for print black and white stickers, receipts, study notes, photos, notes from your phone.
📋 LABEL MAKER STICKER: Don't worry about running out of power during a print picture, sticker, label or document. Our decal maker comes with a long-lasting battery to ensure uninterrupted printing.
body.description: VALENTINE'S DEALS DON'T MISS OUT ON BUYING THIS AMAZING MINI STICKER PRINTER MACHINE! COMPACT DESIGN: COMPACT DESIGN:Dimensions: 3.2 x 3 x 1.6 inches or 8.4 x 7.6 x 4 cm. Its compact and sleek design allows you to easily carry it with you wherever you go. It can effortlessly fit into your pocket, handbag, backpack, or you can simply carry it in your hand. The printer requires 2.2"/57mm thermal printer paper.BATTERY LIFE:The device comes with a built-in 1200mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery. This battery offers an extended standby time, ensuring that your phone printer is ready to use when you need it. You can print on the go without worrying about running out of power.VERSATILE USE:Whether you're a frequent traveler or a professional on the move, this phone printer is perfect for you. Its compact size and versatility make it ideal for travel, allowing you to print photos, documents, and more while you're away from home or the office. It's also a great companion for business trips.EASY CONNECTIVITY:Connecting your phone to this printer is a breeze, taking only 1 second via Bluetooth. You'll be able to start printing quickly and conveniently, eliminating any complicated setup processes.USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE:The device features a simple and intuitive app interface. This user-friendly interface makes it easy for anyone to use, whether you're a student, office worker, or just looking for a thoughtful gift for friends and family. Its simplicity ensures that you can start printing and sharing memories or important documents without any hassle. Discover the revolution in portable printing with our inkless mini printer.THIS DEVICE COMES BUNDLED WITH:1 x Mini Printer4 x rolls of thermal paper4 x rolls self-adhesive thermal printing paper1 x Black hard case1 x USB charging cable1 x User ManualTiny print app is a mobile application designed for printing small-sized documents, images, or photos from a mobile device. 1-click instant printing. Download "Tiny Print" App from Apple store or Google Play.Mini Impresora Portatil, Mini Impresora Portatil Bluetooth, Mini Printer Sticker Maker, Tiny Printer, Black Hard Case, Print Pods, Bluetooth Pocket Printer, Bluetooth Inkless Printer, Best printer for college student, portable printer mini, custom sticker maker machine, mini wireless printer portable and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with my purchase. I had seen several sticker printers for more than $30 that only came with one roll of printing or a maximum of 5 rolls. This printer comes with 9 rolls, an excellent quality hard case that protects my printer (I have not seen that bundle with other printers), and the print quality is excellent! I recommend this product 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like it!
reviews.reviewText: It works well. It will be used often. Only “issue” is that parts of the app are in another language and I’m not sure how to work specific features. I do like the printer though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received the package, was impressed with the way it comes in a nice case. 9 thermal paper rolls included. Product came as specified by seller, very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this thing
